message.idle: Take a breather. The battle will wait.
message.paused: Game paused. Take a moment before resuming the defense.
message.ad: Ad break in progress. The game will resume automatically.

leaderboard.empty: No scores yet. Be the first to submit a score.

end.detailLose: The base was overrun. Try again!

storyIntro.title: Neon Empire Briefing
storyIntro.text: A portal ripped open beside the Neon Empire capital world. Deploy living crystal defences and stop the alien scouts before they pour through.

buildTower.title: Deploy Your First Tower
buildTower.text: Click on a glowing platform to build your first tower. Each tower costs 12 energy harvested from our living crystals.

buildFourTowers.title: Build Four Defenders
buildFourTowers.text: Build 4 towers to create a solid defensive line before the first wave arrives. Position them strategically to cover both lanes.

switchColor.title: Match Enemy Colors
switchColor.text: Select a tower to toggle its color. Matching enemies take full damage while mismatched shots only hit with 30% power.

startWave.title: Begin the Assault
startWave.text: Press "Next Wave" when you are ready. Survive every wave to protect the base!

energyEconomy.title: Harvest More Energy
energyEconomy.text: Every destroyed ship and completed wave feeds more energy into your reserves. Watch the meter to afford new towers and color switches.

prepareMerge.title: Prepare for Merge
prepareMerge.text: Build two adjacent towers of the same color and level. When they're ready, you'll be able to merge them!

mergeTowers.title: Combine Towers
mergeTowers.text: Great! Now press the Merge Towers button to fuse them into a stronger tower with a different weapon!

removeTower.title: Dismantle with a Long Press
removeTower.text: Press and hold on a tower to scrap it. Long presses free the platform whenever you need room or the wrong color.

scoreSystem.title: Chase High Scores
scoreSystem.text: You earn score for every kill and for clearing waves. The HUD tracks your local best, and the Pause menu links to the global top 20 leaderboard.

storyWave10.title: Ancient Arsenal Unlocked
storyWave10.text: By wave 10 scientists re-arm old war relics—machineguns, railguns, and rockets—to bolster the line. Hold the portal at all costs!

upgradeTower.title: Upgrade your Towers
upgradeTower.text: Now there is a way to upgrade your towers without merging! Click Upgrade button, then choose tower. Keep in mind hat upgrading towers this way is very expensive and should be used when merging cannot help.
